timeline.message:
Incorrect query param

Changing the query parameter from "john=admin" to "user=john" for the second line approval request

timeline.author: cristianonicolai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -142,14 +142,14 @@ This should return empty response as the admin user was the first approver and b
 Repeating the request with another user will return task
 
 ```
-curl -H 'Content-Type:application/json' -H 'Accept:application/json' 'http://localhost:8080/approvals/{uuid}/tasks?john=admin&group=managers'
+curl -H 'Content-Type:application/json' -H 'Accept:application/json' 'http://localhost:8080/approvals/{uuid}/tasks?user=john=admin&group=managers'

timeline.message:
Update kogito-usertasks-quarkus/README.md

My bad!. Silly one :-). Thanks!
